entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrade Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenAPI and add support for OpenAPI v3.1 #58619
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Open API] Nullability set on component schema level and not operation. Causing multiple component schemas being generated. #58617
  • Blazor WebAssembly - HTML select tag with @onchange event does not hit breakpoint when clicking to select values from dropdown using the cursor, but works with up/down key from keyboard #58615
  • Perf regression: json #58611
  • Perf improvement: https, plainTextSansFilter #58610
  • my clients logouts after 30 minutes #58609
  • When adding attribute ResponseCacheAttribute, it does not take any effect. #58604
  • dotnet watch sometimes broken when ItemGroup was added #58603
  • dotnet watch run 自动退出，提示Exited with error code -1073740940 #58601

Closed

  • YAML configuration provider #58614
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, updates #58595
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #58602
  • Visual studio ignoring docker file #58064
  • Blazor Server - @key can crash the circuit #58385

PullRequests

Created

  • Use FullName in InstallJdk script #58618
    area-infrastructure
  • Support returning OpenAPI document in YAML from MapOpenApi #58616
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [release/2.3] Update EF Submodule to 2.3 #58613
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Adjust PGO data path #58600
    blocked, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • 54978 02 #58592
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • if actual bytes to be written is negative, set to zero #58575
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Prevent unnecessary debugger stops for user-unhandled exceptions in Blazor apps with Just My Code enabled #58573
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 9.0.1
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • [s390x] Fix Extensions.ApiDescription.Client tests on s390x #58235
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #58095
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Test on CentOS 7, not RedHat 7 #58561
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
